20101207023512.000|20101207023514.000|CCO|AMERICAN," GOES THE THINKING,

20101207023518.000|20101207023520.000|CCO|IN BRITAIN, LYING LOW BUT LIVING

20101207023523.667|20101207023525.333|CCO|CHANGE.
